detectors.description:
Reentrancy in CryptoRoulette.play(uint256) (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/f787a3b683932a30e4beb0e4a57b41f2.sol#33-48):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/f787a3b683932a30e4beb0e4a57b41f2.sol#43)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastPlayed = now (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/f787a3b683932a30e4beb0e4a57b41f2.sol#47)
	- shuffle() (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/f787a3b683932a30e4beb0e4a57b41f2.sol#46)
		- secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1))) % 20 + 1 (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/f787a3b683932a30e4beb0e4a57b41f2.sol#30)
